phrases.phrase: <title>How many categories to show in title</title><info>When viewing a photo with categories assigned you can show these categories in the title of the page. This setting tells how many categories to show. Set to 0 if you dont want to show categories in the title of the page when viewing a photo.</info>
Can create a new photo album?

Define the total number of photo albums a user within this user group can create. Notice: If you set this value to null it will allow them to create an unlimited amount of photo albums. Setting this value to 0 will not allow them the ability to create photo albums.
Points received when uploading a new image.
Can use privacy settings when creating an album?
<title>Upload Inputs</title><info>Define how many upload inputs should be displayed when a user is uploading photos.</info>

Define the maximum number of images a user can upload each time they use the upload form. Notice: This setting does not control how many images a user can upload in total, just how many they can upload each time they use the upload form to upload new images.
Can add photos to the public rating sections?
Can control how comments behave on their photos?
Can add mature images with warnings?
Define how many images a user can view at once when browsing the public photo section?
Define how many photos should be displayed by default. Notice: This value must be part of the setting photo.total_photos_displays array in order to be valid.

Define the max number of photos a user can view on each page. Notice: This value should work together with the setting photo.total_photos_displays and in most cases should either be the same value as the highest number in the array or lower. The reason to set this value lower is to show users that the gallery can at max view 100 per page but maybe you only want this specific user group to display 24 images out of that max total (100).

Define how many minutes or seconds the script should wait until it refreshes the feature photo. Notice: To add X minutes here are some examples: [code] 1 min 2 min 30 min [/code] If you would like to define it in seconds here are some examples: [code] 20 sec 30 sec 90 sec [/code]
Can view all available photo sizes?
Can edit photo albums that belong to other users?
Can add a new photo album?

Can view hidden photos? Notice: This is intended for a user group with Admin rights as this will allow them full access to all photos uploaded on the site, which in return can give them control to moderate images.

If you would like to protect the privacy of your members photos set this option to True. By enabling this feature users will not be allowed to view images via their direct path if they do not have permission to view that specific image. This will however add extra queries to the database and can add an extra strain to the server. Notice: Apache "mod_rewrite" will have to be enabled to use this feature. Once you have enabled this feature you must edit the file ".htaccess" find in your sites root directory. Look for the following in that file: [code] # RewriteRule ^file/pic/photo/(.*).(.*)$ static/image.php?file=$1&ext=$2 [/code] Replace it with: [code] RewriteRule ^file/pic/photo/(.*).(.*)$ static/image.php?file=$1&ext=$2 [/code]
Can delete photos uploaded by other users?
Can edit photos added by other users?
For a photo that is marked as "Mature (Strict)" define the age limit? Note:The age you define will allow users with that age or older the ability to view mature photos.
{owner_full_name} added photos to their album "{album_name}".
Set to True if you would like to enable the ability for users to rate on photos uploaded by other users.

Define how many images to cache when rating images. This will load X photos when visiting the rating section and will allow users the ability to rate images at a very fast rate. Once X images have been rated the script will use AJAX to load the next round of X images. Notice: "X" is the value of this specific setting.

Set to True if photos within the rating section should be randomized. If set to False we will display images based on the date they were uploaded in descending order. Notice: Either setting will allow the users the ability to only rate an image once. Images are not recycled.
<title>Photo Cache for Photo Battle</title><info>Define how many images to cache when display the photo battle.</info>
Set this to True if photos uploaded must be approved before they are visible to the public.
Can approve photos that require moderation?

Set to True if you would like to rename a photo based on what the title of the photo or the title provided by the user when processing their recently uploaded photos. By default we use a 32 character unique hash to protect images, however enabling this feature will still create a unique ID for each image and help with image SEO. Notice: Apache "mod_rewrite" will have to be enabled to use this feature. Once you have enabled this feature you must edit the file ".htaccess" find in your sites root directory. Look for the following in that file: [code] # RewriteRule ^file/pic/photo/([0-9]+)/([0-9]+)/([A-Za-z0-9]{32}+)-(.*?)([_0-9]*?).(.*)$ file/pic/photo/$1/$2/$3$5.$6 [/code] Replace it with: [code] RewriteRule ^file/pic/photo/([0-9]+)/([0-9]+)/([A-Za-z0-9]{32}+)-(.*?)([_0-9]*?).(.*)$ file/pic/photo/$1/$2/$3$5.$6 [/code]
Can delete photo albums created by other users?
Can tag photos added by other users?
How many times can a user tag their own photo?
How many times can this user tag photos added by other users?
<title>Total Tags on Photos</title><info>Define how many tags a photo can have.</info>
Max file size for photos upload in kilobits (kb). (1000 kb = 1 mb) For unlimited add "0" without quotes.
Enable this option to watermark photos. Notice: The setting core.watermark_option must be enabled.
<title>Photo Meta Description</title><info>Meta description for the photo sections.</info>
<title>Photo Meta Keywords</title><info>Keywords for the photo sections.</info>
You have reached your limit. You are currently unable to create new photo albums.
No more available images to rate.
Provide a name for your album.
Select a privacy setting for your album.
Provide a name for your photo category.
Password is not correct. Please try again.
Not allowed to download this image.
{full_name}'s photos on {site_title}. {full_name} has {total_photo} photo(s) and {total_album} photo album(s).
Sorry, this photo can only be viewed by those older then the age of {limit}.
Not a valid photo album to delete.
You do not have sufficient permission to delete this photo album.
This photo is already tagged in the same position.
No more tags for this photo can be added.
{full_name} has already been tagged in this photo.
Non sei autorizzato a taggare questa foto.
{full_name} added a new comment on their own photo.
{full_name} added a new comment on your photo.
{full_name} added a new comment on {item_user_name}'s photo.
{user_name} left you a comment on {site_title}. To view this comment, follow the link below: {link}
{user_name} left you a comment on {site_title}, however before it can be displayed it needs to be approved by you. You can approve or deny this comment by following the link below: {link}
{full_name} ha pubblicato un commento sulla tua foto "{title}".
{full_name} approved your comment on {site_title}. To view this comment, follow the link below: {link}
Unable to find the photo you plan to edit.
None of your files were uploaded. Please make sure you upload either a JPG, GIF or PNG file.
Public (Photos will be added to our public photo section.)
Personal (Photos will only be displayed on your profile.)
Friends (Only you and your friends can view this album.)
Preferred List (Only you and the members you select can view this album.)
Enabling this option will allow others the rights to download this photo.
Enabling this option will allow others the rights to download these photos.
No photos have been added yet.
Be the First to Upload a Photo.
Click here to upload a photo.
Imposta questa foto come copertina dell'album.
The photo you are about to view may contain nudity, sexual themes, violence/gore, strong language or ideologically sensitive subject matter.
Would you like to view this image?
Are you sure you want to delete this album and all the pictures that belong to it?
Note that this cannot be undone.
This photo album is password protected.
There is one image that requires your approval.
There are {total} images that require your approval.
No public photos have been uploaded yet.
You have not uploaded any photos yet.
{user_info} has not uploaded any photos yet.
Note that "Global Photo Settings" will override any settings saved individually below.
Puoi caricare una foto in formato JPG, GIF o PNG.
Il limite massimo di peso di una immagine è {file_size}. Se il caricamento non funziona, prova a caricare un'immagine più piccola.
Click here to tag as yourself.
Seleziona l'area della foto da ritagliare per l'anteprima.
Not enough photos to have a battle.
Get the battle started and upload some photos.
Advanced critique is encouraged when commenting on this photo.
Criticism is discouraged when commenting on this photo.
Can browse and view the photo module?
A {full_name} piace il loro album fotografico.
A {full_name} piace l'album di {view_full_name}.
A {full_name} piace la foto di {view_full_name}.
A {full_name} piace la loro foto.
A {full_name} piace il tuo album.
A {full_name} piace la tua foto.
Can view private and password protected photos?
No photo battles have taken place.
<title>AJAX Refresh Featured Photos</title><info>With this option enabled photos within the "Featured Photo" block will refresh.</info>
Sorry, the photo you are looking for no longer exists. Please click here to browse more photos.
Personal (This album will only be displayed on your profile.)
Public (This album will be added to our public photo album section.)
Aggiornate le miniature delle tue foto
Can members of this user group explicitly set a photo as Sponsor?
Can members of this user group purchase a sponsored ad space?
In order to sponsor a photo click on the photo you wish to sponsor below and then look for the link "Sponsor this Photo".
How much is the sponsor space worth? This works in a CPM basis.

After the user has purchased a sponsored space, should the item be published right away? If set to false, the admin will have to approve each new purchased sponsored photo space before it is shown in the site.
Payment for the sponsor space of photo: {sPhotoTitle}

How many minutes should a user wait before they can upload another batch of photos?
Note: Setting it to "0" (without quotes) is default and users will not have to wait.
Uploading photos a little too soon.
The following files were not uploaded because their size exceeds the limit of {iLimit}: {sFiles}

<title>Enable Mass Uploader</title><info>When enabled users will be allowed to use a mass photo uploader to select multiple files from a single file select dialog.
This uses an integration of SWFUpload (http://code.google.com/p/swfupload/) and thus it uses a Flash object.</info>
Define how many photos to display within an album on a users profile.

<title>Auto Crop Photos</title><info>If this option is enabled images within the photo section will crop images so each image has the same width/height giving the photo section a cleaner look. This works similar to how the photo section on Facebook works.</info>

<title>View Photos in Theater Mode</title><info>In several areas where we display photos, when a user clicks on the photo they will be able to view the photo on the spot in what we call "Theater Mode" if this option is enabled.</info>
Unable to find the photo you are looking for.
Note when selecting a photo to import below it will not import its privacy settings as you can control the privacy settings with the item you are attaching this photo to.
Setting this photo as your profile picture. Please hold...
Please hold while your images are being processed. Processing image
Unable to view this item due to privacy settings.
Control who can see these photo(s).
Control who can comment on these photo(s).
Problemi di caricamento? Prova il sistema alternativo (funziona nei pc e browsers meno recenti).
Control who can see this photo album and any photos associated with it.
Control who can comment on this photo album and any photos associated with it.
